roleset.name: (make/be) longer
roleset.note: ELONGATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'elongate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from elongate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: And he hadn't used hormones, which [many growers]-2 employ [*-2]to elongate their Delicious apples for greater eye appeal.
